com.mendelu.vui_nim

Class GameActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.mendelu.vui_nim.GameActivity

  • public class GameActivity
extends java.lang.Object
    Created by Jakub on 06.06.2016. Activity is core of whole application. Represents all back-end functions in the game.

    • Field Summary

      TextView amountTextView

      Function is used for took one bean.
      void clickTookTwo(View view)
      Function is used for took two beans.
      protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
      Constructor of new game connect activity with layout and take parameters from settings, if they haven't been set, then method set defaults.
      boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu)
      Created menu including a popup window for save and restart.

      Method is situated situated in popup window and it restart the game by setting all parameters to default or changed by settings.

      Method is situated situated in popup window and it save the state of the game into the database.

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Constructor of new game connect activity with layout and take parameters from settings, if they haven't been set, then method set defaults.

      • onCreateOptionsMenu

        public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(Menu menu)
        Created menu including a popup window for save and restart.

      • save

        public void save(MenuItem item)
        Method is situated situated in popup window and it save the state of the game into the database. After define name function takes actual date time and send them by method insert from open helper into the db with result of the game and number of beans.

      • restart

        public void restart(MenuItem item)
        Method is situated situated in popup window and it restart the game by setting all parameters to default or changed by settings.

      • clickTookOne

        public void clickTookOne(View view)
        Function is used for took one bean. It is used for player or computer. Decrease number of beans and then it switch computer with player or vice versa. Returns new state or final result of the game.

      • clickTookTwo

        public void clickTookTwo(View view)
        Function is used for took two beans. It is used for player or computer. Check number of beans and then decrease them, after that it switch computer with player or vice versa. Returns new state or final result of the game.
